meanings.definition: To spend time aimlessly or to dawdle.
meanings.sent1: The children lollygagged in the park, enjoying the sunshine.
meanings.sent2: She lollygagged on her way to the store, taking in the sights.
meanings.sent3: Instead of doing his chores, he lollygagged around the house all day.
meanings.sent4: Time lollygagged by like a slow-moving turtle on a lazy afternoon.
meanings.sent5: The cat lollygagged lazily in the warm sun, without a care in the world.

meanings.definition: To waste time or to procrastinate.
meanings.sent1: He lollygagged on his homework, causing him to rush at the last minute.
meanings.sent2: Don't lollygag when there's work to be done; time is precious.
meanings.sent3: She always lollygags when it comes to making important decisions.
meanings.sent4: Procrastination lollygagged its way into his daily routine, causing chaos.
meanings.sent5: The student lollygagged through the assignment, leading to a lower grade.
